Articles.Content:
Hi All,

First post so be gentle lol, trying to install realism overhaul through CKAN, however it won't install because 2 of the dependencies are unavailable, they are https://github.com/sarbian/SmokeScreen/ and sarbian/ModularFlightIntegrator, without these the ro mod will not load, any ideas to alternate locations, or can someone e-mail me a copy of the zip?

Regards

Toothpic
Are they still unavailable? Sounds like sarbian's server was having a hiccup, I can access it now...
